title: Rohan Dennis Receives Suspended Sentence, 5-Year Driving Ban in Death of Wife Melissa Hoskins
content:
Rohan Dennis given suspended sentence and driving ban after fatal incident involving wife Melissa Hoskins in December 2023.

Read the full article at Rohan Dennis Receives Suspended Sentence, 5-Year Driving Ban in Death of Wife Melissa Hoskins on Velo.
author: ahood
